If you haven't made your bot yet, don't worry! We've got your back. Bring your components to our Hands-on Session and we'll make sure your bot works.

Hope to see you all there. Cheers!

If you haven't made your bot yet, don't worry! We've got your back. Bring your components to our Hands-on Session and we'll make sure your bot works.

Hey Freshers!
The much awaited Robosoccer Challenge 2017 is finally here! Come, make your very own robot and cement your foothold in the world of robotics!
Date: 10:00AM
Time: 27-08-2017
Veunu: Technology Robotix Society

message:
Come and make your very own robot. We will ensure that your motor gushes and make you fall in love with this world of robotics.

Venue: V2
Timings: 6pm- 8pm.

PS: Get all the components from the list given earlier.

Hope to see you there. Cheers!

Attention Freshers!
Due to some unforeseen circumstances, the venue for K.R.A.I.G. 102 has been shifted to S-301 (Engineering Drawing room). We regret the inconvenience caused. 

Hope to see you there!

Attention Freshers!
Due to some unforeseen circumstances, the venue for K.R.A.I.G. 102 has been shifted to S-301 (Engineering Drawing room). We regret the inconvenience caused. 

Hope to see you there!

Hope you all enjoyed the first workshop of KRAIG 101. We were very excited to see a lot of people turn up. The journey to making a robot has just begun and with your enthusiasm, it can go a long way. See you at KRAIG 102 where we will teach about more concepts in the Manual Robotics so that you can make a working bot and get your adrenaline rush pumped up. You will be put to test when each of your bots compete against your friends in the ultimate Freshers' Robosoccer competition.
